metadata.title: CVE-2023-0266 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high
metadata.description:
A use after free vulnerability exists in the ALSA PCM package in the LinuxKernel. SNDRV_CTL_IOCTL_ELEM_{READ|WRITE}32 is missing locks that can beused in a use-after-free that can result in a priviledge escalation to gainring0 access from the system user. We recommend upgrading past commit56b88b50565cd8b946a2d00b0c83927b7ebb055e

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-0266` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-2-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-4.4.0-2-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-4.4.0-2-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-4.4.0-2-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-4.4.0-2-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-4.4.0-2-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-4.4.0-2-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-2-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-208-generic - 4.15.0-208.219~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-208-generic - 4.15.0-208.219~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-208-lowlatency - 4.15.0-208.219~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1004-kvm - 4.4.0-1004.9
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1001-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1001-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1153-aws - 4.15.0-1153.166~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1162-azure - 4.15.0-1162.177~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1147-gcp - 4.15.0-1147.163~16.04.1

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-2.16').
linux-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-208.219~16.04.1').

linux-oracle package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1116.127~16.04.1').
